title: test_chat_api_with_rag_context
description: Verify that the /chat endpoint correctly processes chat messages, integrates retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) context, and returns AI-powered responses with intent, confidence score, context used, and suggestions.

title: test_property_management_crud_and_filtering
description: Test the /properties and /properties/{property_id} endpoints for full CRUD operations including creation, retrieval, update, deletion, and advanced filtering with pagination.

title: test_client_management_crud_and_filtering
description: Validate the /clients endpoint for client record creation, retrieval with filtering and pagination, and proper handling of client preferences and contact information.

title: test_market_data_analytics_endpoints
description: Ensure the /market/overview, /market/areas/{area_name}, and /market/trends endpoints return comprehensive, accurate, and up-to-date market analytics, area-specific data, and price trends.

title: test_document_ingestion_upload_and_status
description: Verify the /ingest/upload endpoint for robust document upload and processing, and the /ingest/status/{file_id} endpoint for accurate retrieval of document processing status.

title: test_authentication_user_registration_and_login
description: Test the /auth/register and /auth/login endpoints for secure user registration and authentication, including correct issuance of access tokens.

title: test_authentication_api_key_generation
description: Validate the /auth/generate-key endpoint to ensure API keys are generated correctly for authenticated users.

title: test_analytics_usage_and_performance_metrics
description: Check the /analytics/usage and /analytics/performance endpoints for accurate system usage statistics and performance metrics reporting.

title: test_health_check_and_system_status_endpoints
description: Verify the /health and /status endpoints provide real-time system health status and detailed system performance information.
